content: I threw together some slides about Zulip that I may one day present at a community call. Comments are open. Feedback is welcome, of course!
Good idea, I will look into that :grinning:

Yesterday I replied to Janet's question about Zulip and said I'd be happy to give a presentation about Zulip during a community call. What do you all think? Should I? :thinking:

Feedback on the slides is still welcome of course!
It seem to be a very good idea to present Zulip during a non technical community call but it depend if followers are familiar with this tools or not, if they are, maybe it's not very usefull ?
Well, I hope that even if they are familiar with Zulip I can surprise them with a tip or two. :crazy:
